description:
version: master
question:
memory_mb_used of compute node only considers CONF.reserved_host_memory_mb. Now memory_mb_used is equal to sum of memory_mb which all instances used and CONF.reserved_host_memory_mb, But do not consider CONF.reserved_huge_pages
title: memory_mb_used of compute node do not consider reserved_huge_pages

comments.content:
version: master
question:
memory_mb_used of compute node only considers CONF.reserved_host_memory_mb. Now memory_mb_used is equal to sum of memory_mb which all instances used and CONF.reserved_host_memory_mb, But do not consider CONF.reserved_huge_pages

comments.content: liuxiuli, Can you please change the bug status to InProgress if you are working on it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sujitha-neti

comments.content: It looks like this bug has gone from being reported to being assigned and skipped the confirmed and triage phases so we can evaluate and prioritize it. Could you please provide more detailed reproduction steps and root cause information? Also, if you are working on this, please submit a patch within 2 weeks and be sure to use the "closes-bug" tag in your commit message.
